alert.note: Alert for Northern Humboldt Coast; Northern Humboldt Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 7:59AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Humboldt County through 830 AM PST... At 759 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Trinidad, or 11 miles northwest of Arcata, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Trinidad, Westhaven-Moonstone, Weitchpec, McKinleyville, Arcata Arpt and Fieldbrook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Humboldt Coast; Northern Humboldt Interior
